```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(distill)
library(ggthemes)
```
```{r}
rawdata <- read_csv("traffic_violaions.csv")
```

```{r}
violationCount <- rawdata |>
  group_by(violation) |>
  summarize(count=n()) |>
  drop_na(violation)
```
```{r}
violationCount |>
  ggplot(aes(x=violation, y=count, fill=count)) +
  geom_col()
```
